query: select lhdp.dsp_locn, lhdp.sku_dedctn_type, lhdp.locn_pick_seq, icb.item_name, icb.item_id,
(SELECT MIN(CB1.QUANTITY) FROM ITEM_PACKAGE_CBO CB1 WHERE CB1.ITEM_ID = icb.ITEM_ID AND CB1.PACKAGE_UOM_ID='25' and CB1.QUANTITY > 1) Case_Qty,
LEAST ((SELECT MIN(CB1.QUANTITY) FROM ITEM_PACKAGE_CBO CB1 WHERE CB1.ITEM_ID = icb.ITEM_ID AND CB1.PACKAGE_UOM_ID='25' and CB1.QUANTITY > 1),
PLD.MAX_INVN_QTY, PLD.MIN_INVN_QTY, PLD.CNTRY_OF_ORGN, PLD.SKU_ATTR_1 ITEM_ATTR_1 ,PLD.PROD_STAT, PLD.LOCN_SEQ_NBR
FROM PICK_LOCN_HDR PLH, LOCN_HDR LHDP, ITEM_CBO ICB, PICK_LOCN_DTL PLD, WM_INVENTORY WMI
where lhdp.locn_id = plh.locn_id and pld.pick_locn_hdr_id = plh.pick_locn_hdr_id
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ITEM_PACKAGE_CBO CB WHERE CB.ITEM_ID = icb.ITEM_ID AND PACKAGE_UOM_ID='26' AND IS_STD='1')
AND PLH.INVN_LOCK_CODE IS NULL AND LHDP.ZONE BETWEEN 42 AND 43 and Rownum < 2
